common.cookies.title: This website uses cookies
common.cookies.body: We use cookies to improve your experience. By using our site, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our Policy.
common.cookies.required_desc: Required for the website to function properly. This category cannot be disabled.
common.cookies.analytics_desc: Helps us understand how the website is used.
common.cookies.marketing_desc: Used to deliver relevant ads and measure campaigns.
common.cookies.functional_desc: Remembers your choices and improves functionality.
common.cookies.footer_hint: You can change your choice later in your browser settings.
hero_title: $VIGRI ‚Äî a token for sports, dance, fans ‚Äî and everyone who cares
hero_subtitle: $VIGRI is a utility token on Solana for payments, discounts, and access to services and experiences from sports clubs and dance studios. Part of the Lumiros ecosystem.
numbers_note: Numbers are indicative; on-chain data will be connected later.
why_intro: $VIGRI Platform is where sports clubs and dance studios offer paid services and unique fan experiences powered by $VIGRI. Fans get access to merch, activities, and digital collectibles, while clubs gain a new revenue stream and engagement tools. Club pages host clear offers, transparent infrastructure funding, and $VIGRI payments; active supporters earn status and perks. $VIGRI turns a meme token into a practical tool of support ‚Äî a simple bridge from Web3 to everyday value.
how_step1: Install a wallet: Phantom or Solflare.
how_step2: Top up SOL to cover fees.
how_step3: Go to the DEX (Raydium/Orca) via the link below.
how_step4: Swap SOL ‚Üí VIGRI and add the token to your wallet.
why_card_payments_desc: Fans get fast checkout for merch, passes, and experiences; clubs get instant $VIGRI receipts and transparent accounting.
why_card_passes_desc: Tokenized passes and tickets: training sessions, backstage, private meetups, away trips with the team, and more.
why_card_crowd_desc: Transparent funding for training facilities, travel, equipment, and other club development ‚Äî directly from fans.
why_card_merch_desc: Pre-orders for official club merch and limited digital collectibles.
why_card_status_desc: Active supporters earn titles, badges, and special opportunities ‚Äî 'Fan of the Month', team shout-outs, community roles, and away-game support.
why_card_clubpages_desc: Dedicated pages for each club to publish offers, sell passes & merch, take $VIGRI contributions, and run fan activities.
why_name_text: A gentle nod to 1980 on the Baltic ‚Äî sailing, fair play, and a friendly spirit of openness and support. We keep the spirit, not any official brand: a warm symbol for fans and clubs.
tokenomics_note: The distribution mechanics of the tax (marketing/liquidity/development) are enforced by the on-chain program and may be refined during development. Full details will be published in the docs.
disclaimer: Important: Not investment advice. VIGRI is a utility token; purchases are at your own risk.
why_social_fund: A share of funds and activity goes to a social fund supporting athletes and clubs in times of crisis.

reset_request.ok: If the email is registered, we sent a message with a reset link.
reset_request.sent_hint: Please check your inbox (and spam folder). The link will expire in 1 hour.
reset_request.info: We will send a password reset link if this email is registered.
roadmap_disclaimer: Timeline is indicative and may shift based on audits, partners, and market conditions.
roadmap_airdrop_note: ‚ÄúEarly Supporters Airdrop‚Äù refers to a small allocation for long-time supporters from our legacy community (details in the docs).
roadmap_i1_v: Devnet finalized; mainnet deploy if stable (mint ‚Üî program linked). Website v1 (EN). Litepaper & docs live. Early Supporters Airdrop and NFT-based presale (two designs). External crowdfunding campaign on a major platform (time-permitting; otherwise Nov).
roadmap_i2_v: Mainnet completion (if needed). Continue presale; launch or advance the external crowdfunding campaign. DEX listing window (Raydium/Orca) with initial liquidity. Results review and brief transparency note on fund use. Prep for platform dev: hiring plan, scope refinement, design prototype.
roadmap_i3_v: Team formation (Feb‚ÄìMar), architecture v0, roadmap decomposition. Clickable UI prototype and technical spikes ‚Äî no MVP promise in this phase.
roadmap_i4_v: Public MVP (subject to funding and team): basic Club Pages and Passes & Experiences v0, limited pilot.
beyond.title: Beyond digital
beyond.text: VIGRI is more than a token and a platform. Our long-term vision is to create an International Training & Rehabilitation Center for professional athletes and dancers. The first center is planned in Estonia ‚Äî a real-world step towards health and recovery. This is a long-term goal that we will develop gradually, openly and transparently.
footer_note: The project is under active development. Content on this site may change without notice. Nothing here constitutes investment advice or an offer to sell securities.
center.title: International Training & Rehabilitation Center
center.image_caption: International Training and Rehabilitation Center for Sports and Dance ‚Äî concept image
center.lead: VIGRI looks beyond digital. Our long-term goal is to create an International Training & Rehabilitation Center for athletes and dancers.
center.context: Before launching any crowdfunding, we will publish a public phase brief: a clear goal and success criteria, a coarse budget range by major categories, and transparency rules (public addresses, reports, multisig/oversight). As materials appear (e.g., a sketch, letters of support) we will add them ‚Äî these are not required to start. Any crowdfunding, if launched, will be phased (land ‚Üí design ‚Üí construction), and the next phase opens only after a public report on the previous one. We do not promise financial returns and we do not offer investment products. Any perks are strictly non-financial (e.g., access or priority booking); their terms will be published in advance and are not linked to returns.

center.bullets.focus.label: Focus:
center.bullets.focus.value: physical recovery, injury prevention, psychological support
center.bullets.approach.label: Approach:
center.disclaimer: This is an early-stage vision. Details, partners and funding stages will be announced step by step.

nft.explainers.title: About the series
nft.explain.buy.title: Buying an NFT = a digital pass and the right to VIGRI
nft.explain.tree_buy.text:
An NFT is a unique digital card on the Solana network that lives in your wallet (e.g., Phantom).
When you buy Tree/Steel, you secure the card and the right to receive VIGRI at the starting price (for this category ‚Äî 100% of the NFT amount at TGE).
The card is yours: you can hold it, gift it, or sell it on marketplaces; it will appear under ‚ÄúMy NFT‚Äù in your dashboard, and all linked rights will be available there.

Payment goes through your connected wallet: choose design and quantity, confirm the transaction; the network fee is charged in SOL.
This is a way to support the project and obtain utility rights ‚Äî not a promise of profit.
nft.explain.tree.d0:
Until the official reveal, the card is shown as a single ‚Äúmystery box‚Äù placeholder. The NFT already belongs to you, is visible in your dashboard, and is stored in your wallet.

At the reveal event, the final image of the selected archetype (Tree/Steel), the serial number, and part of the metadata are disclosed.

Planned reveal window ‚Äî Q2 2026. We will announce the exact date in advance ‚Äî in the dashboard and in the project‚Äôs Telegram channel.

After the reveal, the metadata are fixed (immutable): the image and properties do not change. Trading on marketplaces is possible both before and after the reveal; the price is formed by the market and is not a promise of profit.
nft.explain.tree.d1:
A total of 2,000 Tree/Steel NFTs are issued ‚Äî one shared supply across both designs. This is a fixed quantity with no additional prints. Each card has a unique serial number and remains part of the collection forever.

At purchase you choose the archetype ‚Äî ‚ÄúTree‚Äù or ‚ÄúSteel‚Äù. All cards share the same series, equal terms, and a common numbering. No new issues are planned for this series.

The limited supply underscores the value of participation: Tree/Steel holders are the first wave of support and form the foundation of the VIGRI collection.
nft.explain.tree.d2:
Every Tree/Steel NFT holder receives VIGRI at the token launch (TGE). Allocation is automatic ‚Äî no buttons or requests ‚Äî and goes to the same wallet that holds the NFT.

The number of tokens is fixed at the starting price and does not depend on later NFT price changes. Even if the NFT presale price increases, the allocation remains the same as for early participants ‚Äî ensuring fairness and equal rules for all.

This mechanism creates a fair launch: those who supported earlier receive tokens at the best price. Allocated VIGRI become available right after TGE and fully belong to the NFT owner.

If the NFT is sold before TGE, the allocation right passes to the new owner. Distribution uses a network snapshot at a pre-announced time. To ensure receipt, keep the NFT in your own wallet during the snapshot (not in a marketplace escrow).
nft.explain.tree.d3:
At purchase you choose one of two archetypes ‚Äî ‚ÄúTree‚Äù or ‚ÄúSteel‚Äù. These are visual styles of the same series: rights and terms are identical.

The choice is made at checkout (in the buy card). After the transaction is confirmed, the design is bound to the NFT and cannot be changed; you can switch only before the final confirmation.

A physical card is not provided in this series.

You are not just buying a card ‚Äî you are choosing who you feel you are within Lumiros:
üå± Tree ‚Äî growth, nature, soul, creation.
‚öôÔ∏è Steel ‚Äî structure, intellect, order, responsibility.

This is more than an NFT ‚Äî it is a first act of self-identification in the project‚Äôs philosophy.
Tree or Steel ‚Äî choose what resonates with you.
The first Lumiros card is not just an NFT, but a choice of beginning: living growth or steely will.
Two paths ‚Äî one purpose.
nft.explain.tree.d4:
Every card has its own serial number ‚Äî part of the collection‚Äôs metadata and a unique identifier within the series. The number appears at the reveal event and is then fixed forever.

The number is stored on-chain together with the NFT: you can see it in your dashboard and on marketplaces. Duplicates are impossible ‚Äî each card has its own mint address and its own number.

The serial number does not change the card‚Äôs terms or rights; it serves transparency, authenticity verification, and supports collectible value.
nft.explain.tree.d5:
‚ÄúCards of Essence‚Äù is a philosophical and artistic project of the Lumiros ecosystem, where each card becomes part of a wider universe of ideas and cultural symbols. They connect art, thought, and real-world value ‚Äî both as digital and as physical artifacts.

Each card has its number, story, and visual image created by an invited studio or artist. Series are released in limited runs under the Lumiros Publishing imprint ‚Äî once per year a new series is created via an open competition of design studios so each era has its own signature.

The project carries a genuine collector spirit: each card is part of a living gallery of ideas, where value is shaped by time, meaning, and people‚Äôs participation.

Tree/Steel holders receive the status of participants in the Lumiros card project and may receive invitations to new releases and special opportunities within the ecosystem.

You are not simply buying an image ‚Äî you receive a fragment of a larger story about the human being, memory, and purpose.
nft.explain.bronze_buy.text:
NFT is a unique digital card on the Solana network, stored in your wallet (for example, Phantom). By purchasing Bronze, you secure your card and the right to receive VIGRI at the starting price for the full value of this NFT at TGE.

The card belongs to you: you can hold it, gift it, or sell it on marketplaces. It will appear in your personal dashboard under 'My NFTs', and all related rights will be available there as well. Payment is made through your connected wallet: choose the quantity, confirm the transaction, and a small network fee in SOL will apply.

Additional Bronze utilities (such as the discount voucher and early access to services) are described in the sections below.
nft.explain.bronze.d0:
Before the official reveal, the card is displayed as a 'mystery box' ‚Äî a single placeholder image. The NFT already belongs to you, is visible in your dashboard, and stored in your wallet.

During the reveal event, the final Bronze design image, serial number, and part of the metadata are revealed.

The planned reveal period is Q2 2026. The exact date will be announced in advance ‚Äî in your dashboard and on the project's Telegram channel.

After the reveal, the metadata becomes fixed (immutable): the image and properties will not change. Trading on marketplaces is possible both before and after the reveal; the price is determined by the market and does not represent a promise of profit.
nft.explain.bronze.d1:
The Bronze series is issued in a limited edition ‚Äî only 1,000 NFTs in total.

The supply is fixed and will not increase over time. Each card has a unique serial number and remains permanently recorded in the collection registry.

The conditions are the same for all holders ‚Äî this is a fair and transparent foundation for the project's future development.
nft.explain.bronze.d2:
Each Bronze holder automatically receives VIGRI tokens at the time of token launch (TGE) ‚Äî for the full value of this NFT at the starting price. No buttons or applications are needed: the tokens will be credited to the same wallet where the NFT is stored.

The number of tokens is fixed at the starting price and does not change due to later NFT price adjustments. This protects early participants and ensures equal conditions for everyone.

If the NFT is sold before TGE, the right to receive tokens passes to the new owner. The distribution is carried out based on a blockchain snapshot taken at a pre-announced date and time. To ensure you receive your tokens, keep the NFT in your wallet at the time of the snapshot (not in marketplace escrow).
nft.explain.bronze.d3:
Together with Bronze, a fixed ‚Ç¨150 voucher with a 25% discount for purchasing additional VIGRI. The voucher‚Äôs face value does not depend on the price at which the NFT was purchased ‚Äî before or after presale.

The voucher is activated automatically after TGE and is valid for 12 months and only on the Lumiros platform. The discount applies to the price at the time of purchase; it may be used in parts or in a single transaction. The remaining balance and history are shown in your account.

The voucher is non-transferable and is voided upon sale of the NFT. It cannot be transferred, gifted, or sold separately from the NFT.

The voucher has no cash value and is not redeemable for cash or cryptocurrency. It grants only the right to buy VIGRI tokens at a discount within the Lumiros platform.
nft.explain.bronze.d4:
Bronze is issued in a single base design ‚Äî no selection is required when purchasing. The card is displayed as a 'mystery box' until the official reveal.

After the reveal, the final Bronze design image and your unique serial number become visible.
nft.explain.bronze.d5:
Each card has its own serial number ‚Äî a part of the collection‚Äôs metadata and a unique identifier within the series. The number appears during the reveal event and is permanently recorded.

The serial number is stored with the NFT on the blockchain: it can be viewed in your dashboard and on marketplaces. Duplicates are impossible ‚Äî every card has its own mint address and number.

The serial number does not affect the card‚Äôs rights or token amount; it exists for transparency, authenticity verification, and to support the collection‚Äôs value.
nft.explain.bronze.d7:
Bronze holders gain early access to selected sections and services of the Lumiros ecosystem. This includes the opportunity to test new features first, participate in closed trials, and receive news about releases before public announcements.

Access activates automatically after TGE and is confirmed by holding a Bronze NFT in your wallet. Some activities may require wallet connection or additional verification within your account.

The list of available services will expand as the platform evolves. The early access right remains valid as long as the NFT is in your possession.
nft.explain.silver_buy.text:
An NFT is a unique digital card on the Solana network that is stored in your wallet (e.g., Phantom). By purchasing Silver, you secure the card and the right to receive VIGRI at the initial price ‚Äî for this category it is 100% of the NFT amount at TGE.

The card belongs to you: you may hold it, gift it, or sell it on marketplaces; it will appear in ‚ÄúMy NFTs‚Äù in your account, and the related rights will be available there as well. Payment is made via the connected wallet: choose the quantity and confirm the transaction; the network fee is charged in SOL.

For Silver you must complete KYC in accordance with the platform rules and amount thresholds. This is a way to support the project and obtain utility rights ‚Äî not a promise of profit.
nft.explain.silver.d0:
Before the official reveal, the card is shown as a single ‚Äúmystery box‚Äù placeholder. The NFT already belongs to you, is visible in the account, and is stored in your wallet.

At the reveal event the final Silver artwork, the serial number, and part of the metadata are opened.

The planned reveal window is Q2 2026. We will announce the exact date in advance ‚Äî in your account and in the project‚Äôs Telegram channel.

After reveal the metadata become immutable: the image and properties do not change. Trading on marketplaces is possible before and after reveal; the price is determined by the market and is not a promise of income.
nft.explain.silver.d1:
The Silver series is issued in a limited run ‚Äî a total of 200 NFTs.

The amount is fixed and does not increase over time. Each card has a unique serial number and remains in the collection registry permanently.

The conditions are the same for all holders ‚Äî a fair and transparent basis for the project‚Äôs development.
nft.explain.silver.d2:
VIGRI tokens are automatically credited to a Silver holder at token launch (TGE) ‚Äî for the full amount of this NFT at the initial price. No buttons or applications: the credit goes to the same wallet where the card is held.

The number of tokens is fixed at the initial price and does not change due to subsequent NFT price movements. This protects early participants and keeps the rules the same for everyone.

If the card is sold before TGE, the right to the credit passes to the new owner (by a network snapshot at a pre-announced date and time). If a sale occurs after the credit, the VIGRI already received remain with you ‚Äî they are a separate asset, not linked to later NFT transfers.

Vesting: 40% unlock immediately at TGE, the remaining 60% unlock linearly over 12 months.

To receive the credit for Silver, you must complete KYC in accordance with platform rules.
nft.explain.silver.d3:
Silver includes a fixed ‚Ç¨1,000 voucher with a 35% discount for purchasing additional VIGRI tokens. The voucher‚Äôs face value does not depend on the current market price of the NFT ‚Äî it is fixed and the same for all Silver holders.

The voucher is activated automatically after TGE and is valid for 12 months and only on the Lumiros platform. The discount applies to the price at the time of purchase; the voucher can be used in parts or in full. The remaining balance and history are shown in your account.

The voucher is non-transferable and is voided upon sale of the NFT. It cannot be transferred, gifted, or sold separately from the NFT.

The voucher has no cash value and is not redeemable for cash or cryptocurrency. It grants only the right to buy VIGRI tokens at a discount within the Lumiros platform.
nft.explain.silver.d4:
Silver is issued in 10 design variants. No choice is made at purchase ‚Äî allocation is random.

Before the official reveal the card is displayed as a ‚Äúmystery box‚Äù. At reveal the final image of the drawn variant and your serial number are opened.

Design affects appearance only. Rights and terms, including VIGRI crediting, are the same for all Silver holders. After reveal the card can be freely traded on marketplaces.
nft.explain.silver.d5:
Each card has its own serial number ‚Äî part of the collection metadata and a unique identifier within the series. The number appears at the reveal event and is fixed permanently.

The number is stored with the NFT on-chain: it can be seen in your account and on marketplaces. Duplicates are impossible ‚Äî every card has its own mint address and its own number.

The serial number does not change the card‚Äôs rights or terms; it exists for transparency, authenticity verification, and to support collectible value.
nft.explain.silver.d6:
As part of the ‚ÄúVIGRI Mystery Draw‚Äù promo, a limited number of Rare and Ultra collectible cards are raffled.
Participation is free and available to all registered users who have passed KYC verification on the official website vigri.ee.

Winners are determined randomly and receive a rare-category NFT with a physical card duplicate.
Prizes have no cash value and do not grant rights to income, project equity, or VIGRI tokens.
Results are published publicly on the website and recorded on-chain.

Holders of Silver/Gold/Platinum/WS NFTs participate in the distribution automatically, on common terms, with equal chances.
The purpose of the campaign is to support and develop the Lumiros community, reward early participants, and preserve the spirit of rarity in the VIGRI collection.
nft.explain.silver.d7:
Silver holders receive priority access to Lumiros ecosystem sections and services: early releases, closed betas, whitelists, and invitations to pilot features ahead of the base level.

Access is activated automatically after TGE and is confirmed by holding a Silver NFT in your wallet. Some activities may require connecting a wallet or additional sign-in in the account.

The list of privileges will expand as the platform develops. The right to priority access remains while the NFT is in your possession.
nft.explain.silver.d8:
When purchasing Silver you may choose an option with the production of a physical version of the NFT card. The choice is made at the time of purchase; you will need to confirm that shipping is paid by the recipient.

The decision about a physical card is fixed at the time of purchase and cannot be changed after the transaction is completed. If the option without production is chosen, adding a physical card later will not be available.

Once production is complete, a notification will appear in your account with a prompt to provide the delivery address. Dispatch occurs after data confirmation and payment of shipping costs.

The physical card is a collectible copy of the digital NFT intended for personal keeping or gifting. It does not replace the digital version and does not affect utility functions, rights, or token accruals.
nft.explain.silver.d9:
DUO-codes are a game and collectible mechanic embedded in the physical cards of the Silver series.

Each physical card contains a fragment of a unique code. Matching two cards forms a full combination that can be activated individually or in cooperation with the owner of the second card.

Upon finding a match, the holder may:
‚Ä¢ activate the code individually (by acquiring the second card), or
‚Ä¢ team up with the paired holder and activate together.

This creates a ‚Äúmatch hunt‚Äù: searching for needed cards, negotiation, exchange, buyout, teaming up. Everyone decides whether to share with others or to collect the full pair alone.

Legal status
DUO-codes are not an investment instrument and do not promise income. They are a Lumiros game and collectible mechanic that fosters interest and interaction among participants without financial guarantees.
nft.explain.gold_buy.text:
An NFT is a unique digital card on the Solana network, stored in your wallet (for example, Phantom). By purchasing Gold, you secure the card and the right to receive VIGRI at the initial listing price ‚Äî for this category it is 100% of the NFT amount at TGE.

The card belongs to you: you may hold it, gift it, or sell it on marketplaces; it will appear in ‚ÄúMy NFTs‚Äù in your account, and related rights will be available there as well. Payment is made via the connected wallet: choose the quantity and confirm the transaction; network fees are charged in SOL.

Gold requires KYC in accordance with the platform‚Äôs rules and amount thresholds. This is a way to support the project and receive utility rights ‚Äî not a promise of income.
nft.explain.gold.d0:
Before the official reveal, the card is shown as a single ‚Äúmystery box‚Äù placeholder. The NFT already belongs to you, is visible in your account, and is stored in your wallet.

During the reveal event, the final Gold design, serial number, and part of the metadata are disclosed.

The planned reveal window is Q2 2026. We will announce the exact date in advance in your account and in the project‚Äôs Telegram channel.

After reveal, metadata is fixed (immutable): image and attributes do not change. Trading on marketplaces is possible both before and after reveal; price is formed by the market and is not a promise of returns.
nft.explain.gold.d1:
The Gold series is issued in a limited run ‚Äî only 100 NFTs.

The supply is fixed and will not increase over time. Each card has a unique serial number and remains in the collection registry permanently.

The terms are the same for all holders ‚Äî a transparent, fair basis for the project‚Äôs further development.
nft.explain.gold.d2:
Gold holders automatically receive VIGRI tokens at TGE ‚Äî for the full amount of this NFT at the initial listing price. No buttons or applications: the allocation will be sent to the same wallet that holds the card.

The token amount is set at the initial price and does not change due to later NFT price fluctuations. This protects early participants and keeps rules equal for everyone.

If the card is sold before TGE, the right to the allocation passes to the new owner (per a network snapshot announced in advance). If it is sold after allocation, the already received VIGRI remain with the wallet to which they were credited ‚Äî this is a separate asset that does not ‚Äúmove‚Äù with the NFT.

Vesting: 20% unlock immediately at TGE, the remaining 80% unlock linearly over 12 months.

KYC is required to receive the Gold allocation in accordance with platform rules.
nft.explain.gold.d3:
Gold includes a fixed ‚Ç¨5,000 voucher with a 40% discount for purchasing additional VIGRI tokens. The voucher‚Äôs face value does not depend on the NFT‚Äôs market price ‚Äî it is fixed and the same for all Gold holders.

The voucher is activated automatically after TGE and is valid for 12 months and only on the Lumiros platform. The discount applies to the price at the moment of purchase; the voucher can be used in parts or in full. Balance and history are shown in your account.

The voucher is non-transferable and is voided upon sale of the NFT. It cannot be transferred, gifted, or sold separately from the NFT.

The voucher has no cash value and is not redeemable for cash or cryptocurrency. It grants only the right to buy VIGRI tokens at a discount within the Lumiros platform.
nft.explain.gold.d4:
Gold is released with the series‚Äô signature design ‚Äî no selection is required at purchase. The final image and serial number are disclosed at reveal and remain permanently fixed.

The serial number is stored with the NFT on-chain: it is visible in your account and on marketplaces. Duplicates are impossible ‚Äî each card has its own mint address and number.

Design affects appearance only; Gold rights and terms are identical for all holders. Numbering is for transparency, authenticity verification, and supporting collectible value.
nft.explain.gold.d5:
For Gold, production of the physical NFT card is included. Shipping costs are paid by the recipient.

After production is complete, an in-account notification will appear with a form to provide the delivery address. Shipment is executed after data confirmation and payment of shipping costs.

The decision on the included physical card is fixed at the time of purchase and cannot be changed. If the delivery address is not confirmed within 90 days from the readiness notification, the order is considered canceled at the buyer‚Äôs initiative. The card may be placed on a Lumiros internal auction, and the right to receive it terminates without compensation.

The right to a physical card is tied to the NFT: if the NFT is sold before dispatch, the right passes to the new owner; if shipping has already occurred, re-issuance is not provided.

Purpose: the physical card is a collectible copy of the digital NFT. It does not replace the digital version and does not affect utility functions, rights, or allocations related to the token.
nft.explain.gold.d6:
TRIO codes are an embedded Lumiros collectible mechanic based on code fragments in physical Gold cards. Each card contains multiple fragments that can be combined with other cards to form a full combination.

A found match is recorded in the Lumiros system as a special participation result.

Upon finding the required fragments, a holder may:
‚Ä¢ activate the code independently by collecting all three cards, or
‚Ä¢ team up with other holders to complete the combination.

TRIO codes foster attention to detail and discovery within the collection. This creates a ‚Äúmatch hunt‚Äù: searching for the right cards, negotiating, exchanging, buying, and combining. Each participant decides whether to collaborate or assemble the trio solo.

Legal status
TRIO codes are not an investment instrument and do not promise income. They are a Lumiros collectible and social mechanic based on interaction and discovery, without financial guarantees or property rights.
nft.explain.gold.d7:
Gold holders receive extended priority access to Lumiros services and releases: closed pilots, early tool versions, participation in focus tests, and pre-integrations.

Access is confirmed by holding a Gold NFT in your wallet and is activated automatically after TGE. Some activities may require connecting a wallet and account authorization.

Gold-level benefits may include: earlier feature access than others, increased participation limits, invitations to private events, and priority feedback treatment (feature requests, bug reports).

The list of opportunities will expand as the platform grows. The right to extended access remains as long as the NFT is in your possession.
nft.explain.gold.d9:
As part of the ‚ÄúVIGRI Mystery Draw‚Äù promo, a limited number of Rare and Ultra collectible cards are raffled.
Participation is free and available to all registered users who have passed KYC verification on the official website vigri.ee.

Winners are determined randomly and receive a rare-category NFT with a physical card duplicate.
Prizes have no cash value and do not grant rights to income, project equity, or VIGRI tokens.
Results are published publicly on the website and recorded on-chain.

Holders of Silver/Gold/Platinum/WS NFTs participate in the distribution automatically, on common terms, with equal chances.
The purpose of the campaign is to support and develop the Lumiros community, reward early participants, and preserve the spirit of rarity in the VIGRI collection.
nft.explain.platinum_buy.text:
An NFT is a unique digital card on the Solana network, stored in your wallet (for example, Phantom). By purchasing Platinum, you secure the card and the right to receive VIGRI at the initial listing price ‚Äî for this category it is 100% of the NFT amount at TGE.

The card belongs to you: you may hold it, gift it, or sell it on marketplaces; it will appear in ‚ÄúMy NFTs‚Äù in your account, and related rights will be available there as well. Payment is made via the connected wallet: choose quantity and confirm the transaction; network fees are charged in SOL.

Platinum requires KYC in accordance with the platform‚Äôs rules and amount thresholds. This is a way to support the project and receive utility rights ‚Äî not a promise of income.
nft.explain.platinum.d0:
Before the official reveal, the card is shown as a single ‚Äúmystery box‚Äù placeholder. The NFT already belongs to you, is visible in your account, and is stored in your wallet.

During the reveal event, the final Platinum design, serial number, and part of the metadata are disclosed.

The planned reveal window is Q2 2026. We will announce the exact date in advance in your account and in the project‚Äôs Telegram channel.

After reveal, metadata is fixed (immutable): image and attributes do not change. Trading on marketplaces is possible both before and after reveal; price is formed by the market and is not a promise of returns.
nft.explain.platinum.d1:
The Platinum series is issued in a limited run ‚Äî only 20 NFTs.

The supply is fixed and will not increase over time. Each card has a unique serial number and remains in the collection registry permanently.

The terms are the same for all holders ‚Äî a transparent, fair basis for the project‚Äôs further development.
nft.explain.platinum.d2:
Platinum holders automatically receive VIGRI tokens at TGE ‚Äî for the full amount of this NFT at the initial listing price. No buttons or applications: the allocation will be sent to the same wallet that holds the card.

The token amount is set at the initial price and does not change due to later NFT price fluctuations. This protects early participants and keeps rules equal for everyone.

If the card is sold before TGE, the right to the allocation passes to the new owner (per a network snapshot announced in advance). If it is sold after allocation, the already received VIGRI remain with the wallet to which they were credited ‚Äî this is a separate asset that does not ‚Äúmove‚Äù with the NFT.

Vesting: 10% unlock immediately at TGE, the remaining 90% unlock linearly over 18 months.

KYC is required to receive the Platinum allocation in accordance with platform rules.
nft.explain.platinum.d3:
Platinum includes a fixed ‚Ç¨10,000 voucher with a 50% discount for purchasing additional VIGRI tokens. The voucher‚Äôs face value does not depend on the NFT‚Äôs market price ‚Äî it is fixed and the same for all Platinum holders.

The voucher is activated automatically after TGE and is valid for 12 months and only on the Lumiros platform. The discount applies to the price at the moment of purchase; the voucher can be used in parts or in full. Balance and history are shown in your account.

The voucher is non-transferable and is voided upon sale of the NFT. It cannot be transferred, gifted, or sold separately from the NFT.

The voucher has no cash value and is not redeemable for cash or cryptocurrency. It grants only the right to buy VIGRI tokens at a discount within the Lumiros platform.
nft.explain.platinum.d4:
Each Platinum is released with an individual series design. The final image and serial number are disclosed at reveal and remain permanently fixed.

The serial number is stored with the NFT on-chain: it is visible in your account and on marketplaces. Duplicates are impossible ‚Äî each card has its own mint address and number.

Design affects appearance only; Platinum rights and terms are identical for all holders. Numbering is for transparency, authenticity verification, and supporting collectible value.
nft.explain.platinum.d5:
For Platinum, a collectible-grade physical card is included. Shipping costs are paid by the recipient.

After production is complete, an in-account notification will appear with a form to provide the delivery address. Shipment is executed after data confirmation and payment of shipping costs.

The decision to include a physical card is fixed at the time of purchase and cannot be changed. If the delivery address is not confirmed within 90 days from the readiness notification, the order is considered canceled at the buyer‚Äôs initiative. The card may be placed on a Lumiros internal auction, and the right to receive it terminates without compensation.

The right to a physical card is tied to the NFT: if the NFT is sold before dispatch, the right passes to the new owner; if shipping has already occurred, re-issuance is not provided.

Purpose: the physical card is a collectible copy of the digital NFT. It does not replace the digital version and does not affect utility functions, rights, or allocations related to the token.
nft.explain.platinum.d6:
QUATTRO codes are a rare system where each discovered match between cards from different series matters. Every match strengthens the value of the Lumiros collection and becomes part of its evolving story.

A holder can search, exchange, or buy cards, expanding their collection and moving closer to rare combinations. QUATTRO codes reflect attentiveness and persistence ‚Äî a path where not only the result but the process of discovery itself is meaningful.

Legal status
QUATTRO codes are not an investment instrument and do not promise income. They are a Lumiros collectible and social mechanic based on interaction and discovery, without financial guarantees or property rights.
nft.explain.platinum.d7:
Platinum holders receive priority invitations to Lumiros private events and early access to new products and features before public launch. Information about upcoming activities will appear in your account and in the project‚Äôs Telegram channel.

Participation conditions
‚Äî The right is confirmed by holding a Platinum NFT in your wallet at the time of announcement/snapshot.
‚Äî Seats are limited; an invitation does not guarantee entry without prior registration (RSVP).
‚Äî Some events may require KYC/ID verification and venue rules compliance.
‚Äî Travel and accommodation expenses are borne by the participant unless otherwise stated.

Early releases
‚Äî Access is provided via closed tests, pilots, or previews.
‚Äî You may be asked to connect a wallet and accept testing rules (NDA, no public sharing before release).
‚Äî Feedback from Platinum holders is processed with priority.

The privilege is tied to NFT ownership: upon sale of the NFT, the seller‚Äôs right to participate ends and may be offered to the new owner at future events. Geographic and legal restrictions may apply and will be specified in the announcement.
nft.explain.platinum.d9:
As part of the ‚ÄúVIGRI Mystery Draw‚Äù promo, a limited number of Rare and Ultra collectible cards are raffled.
Participation is free and available to all registered users who have passed KYC verification on the official website vigri.ee.

Winners are determined randomly and receive a rare-category NFT with a physical card duplicate.
Prizes have no cash value and do not grant rights to income, project equity, or VIGRI tokens.
Results are published publicly on the website and recorded on-chain.

Holders of Silver/Gold/Platinum/WS NFTs participate in the distribution automatically, on common terms, with equal chances.
The purpose of the campaign is to support and develop the Lumiros community, reward early participants, and preserve the spirit of rarity in the VIGRI collection.
nft.explain.ws_buy.title: WS ¬∑ 20 ‚Äî early participant status of Lumiros
nft.explain.ws_buy.text:
WS ¬∑ 20 is a personalized (name-bound) NFT issued by invitation to participants whose role and support contributed to the formation of the Lumiros ecosystem. This is not a sale and not a public offer: the issuance and allocation of WS ¬∑ 20 are determined by the Lumiros team individually, based on actual participation and contribution.

The NFT appears in ‚ÄúMy NFTs‚Äù and confirms your status in the community. Any terms and utility rights, if provided for WS ¬∑ 20, will be published in the dashboard and in official announcements. This status is not a promise of income and does not provide financial guarantees ‚Äî it reflects recognition of your participation in the project‚Äôs development.
nft.explain.ws.d0:
Before the official reveal, the card is shown as a ‚Äúmystery box‚Äù ‚Äî a single placeholder. The NFT already belongs to you, is visible in the dashboard, and is stored in your wallet.

During the reveal event, the final WS design image, the serial number, and part of the metadata are disclosed.

The planned reveal window is Q2 2026. The exact date will be announced in advance ‚Äî in the dashboard and in the project‚Äôs Telegram channel.

After the reveal, the metadata is fixed (immutable): the image and attributes do not change. Trading on marketplaces is possible both before and after the reveal; the price is determined by the market and is not a promise of profit.
nft.explain.ws.d1:
The WS-20 series is limited to only 20 NFTs.

The supply is fixed and will not increase over time. Each card has a unique serial number and remains permanently in the collection registry.

The terms are the same for all holders ‚Äî a transparent and fair basis for the project‚Äôs further development.
nft.explain.ws.d2:
The WS-20 holder automatically receives VIGRI tokens at token launch (TGE) ‚Äî in the amount of ‚Ç¨500 at the token‚Äôs starting price. No buttons or applications: the allocation will be sent to the same wallet where the card is stored.

WS-20 is a ‚Äúsoulbound‚Äù (non-saleable, non-transferable) NFT. It is not intended for sale or gifting and remains bound to the owner as a mark of personal involvement. If access is lost, re-issuance is possible upon request to Lumiros with identity verification; in this case, the original NFT becomes void.

KYC is required to receive the WS-20 allocation in accordance with platform rules.
nft.explain.ws.d3:
Together with the WS-20 NFT, a fixed ‚Ç¨10,000 voucher is provided with a 60% discount for purchasing additional VIGRI tokens. The voucher‚Äôs face value is fixed and the same for all WS-20 holders.

The voucher is activated automatically after the TGE and is valid for 12 months and only on the Lumiros platform. The discount is applied to the price at the moment of purchase; the voucher can be used in parts or all at once. The remaining balance and history are shown in the dashboard.

The voucher is non-transferable. It cannot be given, gifted, or sold separately from the NFT.

The voucher has no cash equivalent and cannot be exchanged for cash or cryptocurrency. It grants the right only to purchase VIGRI tokens at a discount within the Lumiros platform.
nft.explain.ws.d4:
Each WS-20 NFT is issued with an individual series design. The final image and serial number are revealed during the reveal and are permanently fixed thereafter.

The serial number is stored with the NFT on-chain: it is visible in the dashboard and on marketplaces. Duplicates are impossible ‚Äî each card has its own mint address and number.

Design affects appearance only; the terms for WS-20 are the same for all holders. Numbering is needed for transparency, authenticity verification, and to support collection value.
nft.explain.ws.d5:
Each WS-20 holder is eligible to receive a special-format physical card ‚Äî a symbol recognizing their role in the formation of Lumiros.

The card is produced individually and includes WS-series design elements, including a unique number and signature details. After production is complete, a notification will appear in the dashboard with a form to specify the delivery address.

Shipping is paid by the recipient. Timelines and the issuing procedure are set by Lumiros and may vary by region.

The physical card is intended for collection purposes and does not replace the digital NFT: it highlights the holder‚Äôs contribution and preserves the memory of the community‚Äôs early stages.
nft.explain.ws.d6:
The WS key unifies all code-system levels ‚Äî DUO, TRIO, and QUATTRO. It symbolizes full participation in the Lumiros collection structure and is used to record links between rare cards.

Each activated combination involving the WS key becomes part of the ecosystem‚Äôs shared cultural layer.

Legal status

The WS key is not a financial or investment instrument. It serves as a utility element for collection and social interaction within the Lumiros ecosystem, without profit guarantees or property rights.
nft.explain.ws.d7:
WS-20 holders receive access to certain internal sections and closed activities of the Lumiros ecosystem: private announcements, test modules, expert discussions, preview materials, and direct communication with the team.

Participation is by invitation or confirmed by the presence of a WS-20 NFT in your wallet. Access rights are bound to the wallet linked to the WS-20 and are not transferable. In case of re-issuance after access loss, the right is moved to the new NFT following identity verification.

The scope of activities, participation formats, and geographic/legal restrictions may change at Lumiros‚Äôs discretion. Capacity is limited; RSVP and/or KYC/ID verification may be required for certain events.
nft.explain.ws.d9:
As part of the ‚ÄúVIGRI Mystery Draw‚Äù promo, a limited number of Rare and Ultra collectible cards are raffled. Participation is free and available to all registered users who have passed KYC verification on the official site vigri.ee.

Winners are selected at random and receive a rare-category NFT with a physical card duplicate. Prizes have no cash value and do not grant rights to income, a project share, or VIGRI tokens. The results are published publicly on the site and recorded on-chain.

Holders of Silver/Gold/Platinum/WS NFTs participate in the distribution automatically, on general terms, with equal chances. The aim is to support and grow the Lumiros community, encourage early participants, and preserve the spirit of rarity in the VIGRI collection.
nft.physical.label: NFT format
nft.activation.title: Activation option
nft.activation.split50: 50/50: half claim now, half as discounted right for 1 year
nft.lumiros.optin: Register me in Lumiros (earn participation points)
nft.intro_title_bold: VIGRI NFT cards ‚Äî your personal mark of participation in building the Lumiros ecosystem.
nft.intro_p1_tail: They grant the right to purchase VIGRI tokens at a special price and to secure your involvement in the project‚Äôs early development stage.
nft.intro_p2: Each card is a unique digital asset on the Solana blockchain with verified provenance and an individual identifier. Purchases are made directly on this page through a compatible crypto wallet (for example, Phantom). After purchase, the NFT fully belongs to you: it can be held, transferred, gifted, or sold on open marketplaces such as Magic Eden.
nft.intro_p3: When the collection is released, the cards appear as mystery boxes ‚Äî sealed artifacts hiding their true design and rarity. The real image and meaning of each card will be revealed later during the official reveal event, when the collection is unveiled.
nft.intro_p4: Some NFT categories include physical cards and special rights within the ecosystem. This is not a speculative investment but a contribution to a real cultural-technological project that unites digital and material value.
nft.summary.tree_2: VIGRI allocation at TGE (100% of NFT value at the starting price)
nft.summary.tree_6: The base series of Vigri NFT. Full token allocation at the starting price ‚Äî a transparent beginning and a reliable foundation of the Lumiros card collection.
nft.summary.bronze_2: VIGRI allocation at TGE (equal to the NFT value)
nft.summary.bronze_6: Automatic participation in the Rare/Ultra rarity drawing
nft.summary.bronze_8: The Bronze level introduces flexibility and the first bonus: the holder receives tokens at the starting price plus a gift voucher for an additional VIGRI purchase during the year.
nft.summary.silver_2: VIGRI allocation at TGE (equal to the NFT value)
nft.summary.silver_6: Automatic participation in the Rare/Ultra rarity drawing
nft.summary.silver_10: The Silver level blends digital and physical collectibles. DUO codes add discovery and cooperation between participants.
nft.summary.gold_2: VIGRI allocation at TGE (equal to the NFT value)
nft.summary.gold_7: Extended access to the Lumiros ecosystem
nft.summary.gold_8: The Gold level embodies rarity and intuition. TRIO codes create a space of discovery, where each found combination may unlock new Lumiros possibilities‚Äîfor those willing to go beyond the obvious.
nft.summary.gold_9: Automatic participation in the Rare/Ultra rarity drawing
nft.summary.platinum_2: VIGRI allocation at TGE (equal to the NFT value)
nft.summary.platinum_7: Access to private events and early Lumiros releases
nft.summary.platinum_8: The Platinum series represents the summit of rarity and inner composure. QUATTRO codes serve those who seek not a reward, but a confirmation of their intuition and taste.
nft.summary.platinum_9: Automatic participation in the Rare/Ultra rarity drawing
nft.summary.ws20_2: VIGRI allocation at TGE amounting to ‚Ç¨500 at the starting price
nft.summary.ws20_6: Extended Lumiros code system with WS-Key
nft.summary.ws20_7: Access to special areas and private Lumiros activities
nft.summary.ws20_8: A limited edition created in gratitude to the members of White Syndicate ‚Äî those who supported Lumiros at its very beginning. WS-20 stands as a symbol of faith, patience, and human support.
nft.summary.ws20_9: Automatic participation in the Rare/Ultra rarity drawing
kyc.banner.hint: Some features are limited until verification.

profile.form.title: Profile
profile.form.languageHelp: This only affects the interface language. It is not your native language or KYC language.
